class jaxl.utils.RunningMeanStd(epsilon: float = 0.0001, shape: Sequence[int] = (), a_min: float = -5.0, a_max: float = 5.0)¶

Bases: object

This keeps track of the running mean and standard deviation. Modified from Baseline. Assumes shape to be (number of inputs, input_shape).

mean: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number¶

The running mean

update_from_moments(batch_mean: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, batch_var: Array | ndarray | bool_ | number, batch_count: int)¶

Updates from the moments

Parameters:

  • batch_mean (chex.Array) – the mean of the current batch

  • batch_var (chex.Array) – the variance of the current batch

  • batch_count (chex.Array) – the amount of data in the current batch
